review: Just let it be known that the firestick sucks for Netflix. Oh sure it plays it....sometimes, and then when it does the picture will freeze while the sound continues for 3 or 4 seconds the picture will literally go into fast forward and then catch up to the sound....extremely frustrating...I have a chromestick too which plays Netflix in HD flawlessly...and yes my ISP is fast....50mps down...
author: Louis E. Degraff

review: Perfect for my kids. They could now watch their favorite shows continuously!! Such a big help for a busy mom.  Easy to set up, remote control is user friendly, my 3 year old can operate it by himself.
author: charizma

review: Enjoy watching movies with my grandson.
author: Wilma Peace

review: So I already have a chromecast and a first gen Roku, but I'd been wanting to replace my Roku. Picked up this fire stick on Prime Day and plugged it in as soon as it came in. Super fast and easy set up. Not as fast as a chromecast, but fast enough. The menu is really clean and easy to navigate. The power cord is plenty long. The remote and app both work with ease. Over all I really like it, enough to say I can throw out the Roku now.
author: Jessie Hernandez

review: It works great. With access to all the content I want.
author: Greg

review: Very easy to get started and good selection to watch, also has good music
author: G. L. Kenr "drive"
